title: Strengthening e-Learning Practical Competencies: FPI-Based Mathematics Instructional Design Strategies for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic math concepts (functions, equations, statistics) and fundamental understanding of curriculum design
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply the five principles of FPI (Activation, Presentation, Application, Integration, Evaluation) to mathematics education.
Learners can design personalized mathematics tasks that foster intrinsic goal motivation.
Learners can develop LMS-based mathematics content that promotes the use of advanced cognitive strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
